website_summaries.verdict: For those seeking a matte stainless steel finish, this is one to consider. Sold in bulk, these solid pulls are highly affordable.
pros: High-end stainless steel appearance at entry-level price (in bulk)
The 3-inch width is common, so it's easy to upgrade old pulls
cons: Included screws may be too small for handle holes
Some handles arrive twisted or bent
A few reports of misaligned or stripped threads

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for cabinet hardware buy these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! That's my first thought on opening these. I'm in the process of updating my master bathroom and saw these online. Of course the bargain shopper I am I checked my local stores. They had packs of 10 for $54.. Very light weight.. So I was scared of what I was getting here. These are almost 5 ounces each!! Very heavy quality, all individually wrapped with the screws for each. Definitely best quality and best price!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Pulls are awesome but scews needed to be replaced
customer_reviews.text: Pulls are awesome but scews needed to be replaced. They are not the right diameter size. They wobbled in the holes and were too short. Nothing a trip to lowes wouldn't fix. Very sturdy three piece build.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R

customer_reviews.title: The price was also great too, as I needed 35
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous, and totally changed the look of my kitchen! The price was also great too, as I needed 35, and had to buy to lots, one 25 and one 10, and the total was around $80 for all of them. Which equals out to less than $2 apiece. You can't buy ones of this quality for that price locally. These are heavy, and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Sterrett

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase of these stainless steel Pulls
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase of these stainless steel Pulls. I've been shopping around and these are 1/3 of the cost from the same ones I seen at Lowe's. Easy to install and made a huge difference in my kitchen appearance definitely would recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M Saxton

customer_reviews.title: I am only giving it one star because there is ...
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving it one star because there is not a choice for zero. The screws are made of very cheap metal and stripped at the head where the screwdriver impression is. The cabinets were damaged trying to remove the stripped screws.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond E

customer_reviews.title: Nice with some work!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and they look nice! Like some of the other reviewers I had to re-tap all my handles so the screws would work. A 8/32 tap and t-handle was used on everyone of them to clean out the screw hole and fix the threads. If you don’t mind doing this before hand they install nice at least mine did and I bought 50+. Yes it’s something you shouldn’t have to do but it is what it is for the savings. I didn't have any crooked handles like some.
customer_reviews.author: Toolman54

customer_reviews.title: Good quality 50 pieces pack is never available but 2 pack of 25 is selling easy ? How is possible ?
customer_reviews.text: Actually i cAme using this on several jobs . They have good finish , good quality and are vedy pretty . Costumers use to love this . My oniy complain is about prices pack . Like a cabinets installer usually i need buy mire pieces . The bigger pack they offer is 50 pieces what is almost never available . O rhink thisnis rhe way they found to do couple extra bucks . Dont understand how 50 pieces are nit available when can i add 2 25 pack on my cart and buy this . Already contact costumer service and they never give a good explanation . Overrall this is a nice product to homeowner and pro users
customer_reviews.author: Luiz Orlando Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Copper T-Knobs!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered the copper t-knobs, I recieved the wrong shipment twice. However, on the third try, I got the right one. It wasn't the fault of the seller but rather the Amazon fulfillment center. They were so quick to respond and were amazing in getting the right item to me so quickly. I have a white kitchen wanted to copper accents throughout. The copper t-knobs look amazing. The quality is great especially for the price. On the cabinets I placedthe knobs vertically and the drawers horizontally. I've uploaded pictures for your reference. Couldn't be any happier with the results. Then blend well with my copper stools and eventually looking for a copper faucet to complete the look.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Y.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars I bought handles like this a while back for hundreds of dollars these are the same handles. The only issue as others have mentioned the screws for the drawers are two short. I used the screws from the previous handles for the drawers only and was fine. The screws are fine for the cabinet doors. Very high end quality. I love them
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Missing screws
customer_reviews.text: The product description says 2 sets of screws included - 2" AND 1/4". Only the 2" screws were included, requiring a trip to the home improvement store to buy shorter screw. A nuisance and added expense. Also, on 2 of the 10 pack, the 2" screws (I needed both long and short) would not screw deep enough into the mounting hole. I struggled so much to remove them I damaged the finish. So I had to throw out 2 of the 10. After the problems, the ones that worked do look good. But I will have to order more to make up for the shoddy manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Barry R Finn

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice! They feel and look expensive
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice! They feel and look expensive. The 25 piece box was quite heavy as these are solid. Installation wasn't too bad either. Glad they supplied 2 different length screws. I did have 1 or 2 screws that didn't thread in properly but not a big deal since there were many extras. These handles make a kitchen feel complete!
customer_reviews.author: Kav

customer_reviews.title: I loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for making such beautiful knobs accessible. I love my kitchen! It might be true that it's a bit unleveled, some of them not all but, I loved it anyways and would buy it again, excellent price and I even got a fast answer about cabinet thickness and what size of screw to use...in case their standard ones are too long...or too short...I always buy hardware expecting to buy my own screws to my own specifications...
customer_reviews.author: Micheli

customer_reviews.title: Heavier not hollow, and nicer than the rest
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel expensive, heavier, not hollow, and are amazing. We just built a home and these were a $1,000 option. I was hesitant to buy because of the price point but when they arrived I couldn’t believe it! Quality and custom look at a fraction of the cost. Advice: buy a quality jig to drill the holes. The best one is here on amazon and is blue and silver, looks like a metal ruler and T square combo with three adjustable sliding templates up and down the ruler. Inexpensive and don’t waste your time on the cheaper alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Legacy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money; Nice Feel
customer_reviews.text: These are nice pulls, especially for the price. There are some relatively minor quality control issues with respect to some discoloration, nicks, scratches, slightly bent stems or stems that don't screw all the way into the pull, and the threading of the stems and the screws themselves have some minor issues. Out of 25 pack I had 2 pulls that were cosmetically unacceptable. The above said, I'd like to reiterate that for the price, these are nice pulls. They are heavy and have a very nice feel to them. I consider these a very good value. If they ever get the quality control issues taken care of, this would be a 5 star product for sure.
customer_reviews.author: boomerod

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Handles!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I installed all 60 of these handles with no problems! I really like these handles. Solid, heavyweight, quality material. I was hesitant due to some negative reviews relating to uneven alignment so I checked all 60 and they are perfect. Also came with two different length screws, 1.25 & 1.75, enough of each length to install all handles. Great price, I'm very happy. Installing tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Scamper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cabinet handles
customer_reviews.text: I chose these handles for my newly renovated kitchen. The satin finish is beautiful with my natural maple cabinetry. They are heavyweight and I'm sure they must be quite sturdy. Installing them was no piece of cake, however. You must make a reliable template for each type of application in which you are installing. The holes to be drilled must be exactly the correct distance apart, and exactly perpendicular to the door surface, or the handle cannot be attached. However, we persevered, and the handles look awesome!
customer_reviews.author: K. Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Love Them, Stems loosen to assist with install!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful change for our kitchen. My favorite feature is that the stems can be loosened to make installation easier. You may need to use a bit of wd40 and a wrench to loosen them. I wrapped a rubber jar lid opener around stem and used pliers to loosen. This way the stems didn’t get scratched. As we replaced existing hardware from 20 years ago this was a awesome discovery as some holes weren’t exactly perfectly aligned. These are nice, solid and heavy. They feel and look way more expensive than they are. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Desmond

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pulls - I've looked elsewhere and the price was 5x - 10x this price. I was a bit nervous reading the reviews of other buyers, but, I needed 43 and ordered 50, figuring that there may be some that didn't work out. Out of 50 we were able to use 49 (only 1 defective). I had 6 more drawers that could use an update as well as my kitchen and bathroom cabinets. They look great, they're sturdy and did I mention a great value? I cannot believe how much these improved the look of wherever these were installed. Recommend you buy as you're not going to get a better deal elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Southern New Hampshire resident

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy !
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage. More than 1/2 the threads are too lose and the screws just spin when trying to tighten handle. The other half are mangled and need to be chased with a tap. Hours upon hours of wasted time. Better to spend more and buy locally so you can take them back. I contacted Amazonabout this and got a 5 dollar credit but it cost me almost 9 dollars to buy new screws??? Bad bad purchase Throwing good mony after bad is what will happen if you buy any of these.
customer_reviews.author: Koji mold

customer_reviews.title: Rusts!
customer_reviews.text: Not really stainless steal. Began rusting after 4 months. Being used in outside cabinets but not exposed to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Victor F

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing else to say except I can tell you shouldn't Hesitate on buying this item because I did I tried it love the look. I saw a lots of reviews about the screw was too short I didn't have that experience because I replaced my Cabinet handles so I didn't use their screw I use my old ones since they're the same size there's no need and none of them was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Coby

customer_reviews.title: Measure twice, drill once!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly. Very well made and heavy, with a lovely gold tone. Installation went smooth, but here is where it gets tricky. Do not drill holes at 5". This will give you headaches and strip the threads. Measure carefully and do one door first for fit. Use a cabinet handle install template if available, if not measure 5 3/32" space properly leveled. The screws should go in straight. I had 42 installed without any issues. If in doubt, do a test install on a piece of plywood. If screw goes in without any problems, then use same measurement for the real deal. I highly recommend these handles and I'm very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Solid and attractive, but not 5" on center
customer_reviews.text: These are well built, solid handles. They come with short screws for 3/4" mounting or long screws for 1 1/2" mounting. The main issue is that they're not 5" on center as advertised, they are 5 1/16". So the nice template I made with 5" centers doesn't work, and I had to make a second one with 5 1/16" spacing. I'd suggest you measure very carefully before buying - if your drawers / cabinets already have holes at 5", you're going to have a problem mounting these. If you are drilling new holes, as I was, it should work out OK as long as you match your template to the actual pulls carefuly.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: First Order Consist Of Rejects
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set of 25 that all were rejects measuring 4 7/8" or 4 15/16" hole center. They were not 5" hole center as the website description described. Since they were not 5" hole centered, none of them would replace my existing cabinet handles. It is sad because the pulls appears to be of quality. However, I ordered a 2nd set, sent an email about the rejects and requested the seller to make sure that they are 5" hole centered handles. Keeping my figures crossed that this time, Alpine Studios LLC will not send me reject handles.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Of Arc

customer_reviews.title: It’s as advertised and the screws fit the threads, very heavy and look great!
customer_reviews.text: The first bunch of these I bought was from Probrieco, and they totally sucked, even the screws they supplied would not go into the threads in the handles! But these are great! I bought 21 pack of the 3” drawer pulls and used em on my cabinets also! They are much heavier that the first bunch I bought and look great! I couldn’t afford to replace the kitchen so I painted the existing cabinets below black and re- painted the top ones white, with these new handles the kitchen is now almost passable....for now! Whishing I coul post photo! Get em!
customer_reviews.author: Scott D.

customer_reviews.title: I liked these bar handles
customer_reviews.text: I liked these bar handles. They are good quality, but out of 25 handles that I ordered, one of them was scratched up and another one was not properly aligned so the handle does not look straight. Unfortunately I need all 25 handles. Hopefully distributor can replace 2 handles (3.75)
customer_reviews.author: Matvey Shkiler

customer_reviews.title: only one screw got stripped (out of 124 - 2 per handle) which is fantastic. Comes with several screw lengths which is good ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as an Xmas gift for the wife, she LOVES it. Picked up 3 packages for my kitchen (62 handles) so had a few extras left over for the bathrooms or probably will drop off @ Salvation Army for whoever has a small kitchen. Used the first 62 handles I pulled from the box, only one screw got stripped (out of 124 - 2 per handle) which is fantastic. Comes with several screw lengths which is good as the drawers are twice as thick as a cabinet. Would buy again if I ever need more handles. Note: box arrived damaged, the delivery person probably wasn't happy with the weight of the package. Contents not damaged from shipping or mishandling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the quality of the product. These handles are very well made and very sturdy. I got few defected pieces but Sellers are great people. They contacted us before us sending them an email about defected pieces. Got their respond immediately. They are sending us the replacement. I would highly recommend the product. You have nothing to lose here. Even if you get a defected piece seller will take care of it for you.
customer_reviews.author: Salman R.

customer_reviews.title: Quality solid pulls, not cheap hollow tubing
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality and waybkess expensive compared to the local big box stores. And they're solid, not hollow cheap pulls like most this style. Out of the 50 total ordered, 1 was unusable, apparantly a manufacturing defect. I needed 42 and expected a couple with issues so I'm still way ahead. The cheap hollow pulls this style and size are $9 each locally. These were less than $2 each and they're solid! I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JNB

customer_reviews.title: awesome handles
customer_reviews.text: after reading some of the reviews for these handles, i was apprehensive about purchasing them. man, was i surprised about the quality and sturdiness of this product! high quality, heavy weight & installation was a snap. i had absolutely no problems with the threads, cross-threading, etc...those were most of the complaints i read on amazon associated with this product. i would certainly buy again/recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Payne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, modern, but cross-threading can occur
customer_reviews.text: I love my house, but hate the color schemes; Updating the kitchen cabinet hardware was the least expensive, easiest and quickest way to give my kitchen an update. From weird curly silver to slick modern. There was a bit of a learning curve when installing - hold the t-post knob against the door, in the level position, then screw from the back end. Don't twist the knob onto the screw. I had issues with the very first one cross threading, and learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, sturdy handles
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality handles. They are very sturdy and look great. This design appears to be a very popular design, there are many brands with the same design and tons of sellers on Amazon. A lot of them are hollow, and look cheaply made so I was concerned about the quality these handles before I received them. I'm glad these are not like the others. These are solid, and have nice weight for the sturdy feel. The finish is excellent. They comes with short and long screws that should work with any kinda cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: kritikos

customer_reviews.title: Quality is poor.
customer_reviews.text: I needed 14 cabinet pulls and ordered 25. These pulls do not hang level. Thank goodness I have extra. I need to replace 7 of them because they appear to hang on an angle. I hope there are enough remaining to switch out the bad ones. The pulls themselves are fine but, in fact very nice, but due to the fact that they do not hang properly I would NOT recommend this product. Quality control is too inconsistent. I recommend going to a big box store and buying your knobs there, it would be a LOT less expensive in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Solid and beautiful but smaller handle and stick out further than expected
customer_reviews.text: So these are nice and solid in your hand and look beautiful with nice finish and no rough edges. They seem durable and high quality, but the handles were shorter than 2" and they stuck out too far from cabinet. In my opinion, they looked awkward sticking out farther than than the handle was wide. They are practical for people with large hands to reach around handle, but they were way too odd for my kitchen and bathrooms. Sadly, I had to return these.
customer_reviews.author: TravelMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight
customer_reviews.text: First off, the weight of the handle is very good. Kudo's for including 2 different lengths of screws ! I had bought 20 handles, had 2 of them that wouldn't accept enough of the screw, one of which when mounting, the screw got stuck, had to get vice grips to get if off the cabinet. After that, I pretested inserting the screws before mounting & found a 2nd one with the same issue. Seller was very quick to respond & resolve the issue to my satisfaction, so they get 5 stars for service/prompt reply. Overall for the price would buy again. BTW, as with a lot of Chinese screws, be careful how you tighten, the head can strip very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cltmrfixit

customer_reviews.title: About 20% of the posts get jammed up.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a "used - good" package, knowing I only needed 18 pieces. 3 of the posts that screw to the door were badly marred. Upon installing them, I found out why: many of them are not threaded properly, and the screws get jammed up, and attempting to back the screw out, just untwists the post from the handle. Expect about 20% to fail in this way. As I only needed 18, I have a couple spare parts, and there the damaged ones away.
customer_reviews.author: Bat Pot

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Functional and Consistent Handles
customer_reviews.text: I updated my kitchen/bathrooms and laundry room cabinet hardware, including replacement of about 65 drawer pulls and door handles. These handles are terrific! They’re a great size, presenting a nice, long line—neither stubby nor “post-modern” width-of-the-cabinet-door overlong. The satin nickel finish is very attractive, and they’re uniform (in both appearance and mounting hole spacing) from one to the next. My only complaint: my order came with the handles and only the longer screws. For the cabinet doors, I had to purchase shorter screws.
customer_reviews.author: Clive Fenster

customer_reviews.title: Color matched perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced hardware on freshly painted grey kitchen cabinets. These gold/brass pulls matched perfectly with new gold sprayed hinges to give my kitchen a “wow” update look. The weight of these pulls was many times heavier than the sample amount I bought from another company...though the finish color was identical, these heavier ones were also slightly longer. The decorator who painted my cabinets was impressed with these pulls and will recommend them to other clients!
customer_reviews.author: D. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Best solid cabinet pull handles for the price and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Would give these 6 stars if I could. It's solid steel and gives some good weight to your cabinet doors! I had ordered 30 but only 29 came in the box. Contacted their customer service and they got back to me within minutes to send me a replacement. These are the best ones I could find on Amazon for the price!
customer_reviews.author: ehinsa

customer_reviews.title: Check the handles before you drill any holes.
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful. The only issue that we had with them is that they're not even, so be careful before you drill any holes in your cabinet doors. We ended up having to try and repair one door because we made a template figuring that all of them would be the same . So just check first. Besides that issue, we love how they look and they aren't some cheap junk. They're nice and sturdy and compliment the decor in our kitchen and dinning room.
customer_reviews.author: Annie N.

customer_reviews.title: Good Price for the Pack
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of these handles. It is a good value, they are just as sturdy as the stuff you get at the big box store, however, one of my handles was broken, and I needed these asap so I had to go buy one at the big box store that isn't an exact match, but who will really notice...right. I did not ask this supplier for a new single handle, not even sure if I could get one. But I am still happy with my decision.
customer_reviews.author: Jennreve

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Inferior quality. Returned and wasn't even provided full refund: "restocking fee"
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Very good - but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like these handles and would have given them 5 stars if the screws threaded into the handles more easily. It's nice that they come with two sets of screws (different lengths for different drawer thickness). However, the screws do not thread it to the handles without some extra pressure. The heads are Phillips which means they're easy to strip if you're not careful. I didn't have any strip but that was because I took great care to keep the screwdriver straight and the tip pressed firmly into the screw head.
customer_reviews.author: KFitz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Pulls
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about ordering these cabinet pulls, however, at 6 dollars each at the local big box stores my options were limited. When they came in I was stunned at how nice they were. I ordered 25 then realized I needed 26 so I ordered another 10. Both packages are exactly the same and I couldn't be happier with this product. You can see in the photo that they look very nice and elegant. I should have also ordered a screw hole template but it never crossed my mind so I built a home-made template which worked prefect. If you are skeptical like I was you can throw those thoughts out on this product. Great Seller!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Durrett

customer_reviews.title: 32% defective - different handle stem lengths
customer_reviews.text: 8 of the 25 had different handle stem lengths. One side was 1" and the other was 3/4" making the handle look lopsided. Others had shorter handle stem lengths on both side so we put those on cabinets that didn't have another handle side by side. Quality control is something to watch for and the customer shouldn't have to buy more to ensure the product is uniform.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted copper hardware in my kitchen and I originally tried spray painting my old hardware. When that started chipping I decided to buy new hardware that I wouldn’t have to paint and these are perfect. I didn’t realize how dull the spray painted copper was until I held them side by side with these ones. Wish I had just bought these to begin with!
customer_reviews.author: Jdora

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Looks and feels exactly like the higher priced counterparts!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I needed to replace the satin nickel ones I originally used. They have been on my kitchen cabinets now for approximately 4 weeks and have shown no discoloration or wear and tear. They feel solid and look fabulous. Gold Glam, not the old school tacky, shiny fake bronze that were all over our home built in 1999. There is no reason to pay 5 plus dollars at your local Home improvement store for each drawer pull when you can order these at a small fraction of that price.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kitchen remodel, and I am thrilled. They look beautiful, and the price is amazing. I saw the same handles at my local building store for $6 each. One really cool thing was that they come with two sets of screws. Most handles have only the short screws so if you need the longer ones, you have to go find them at the store. It's very convenient that they come with the longer ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ula

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy drawer pulls
customer_reviews.text: These drawer pulls are really nice. My wife's 1st comment when she saw the finished dresser was " How much did those drawer pulls cost, they look great". The oil rubbed bronze looks great on the cedar drawers I built. Glad they came with 2 sizes of fasteners, I needed the longer ones. With the thickness of my drawer material I expected to have to purchase extra long fasteners but the included ones worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted knobs that had pizazz but i wasnt willing to spend $5 a knob. that adds up quick! i stumbled across these and decided to give them a chance! and i LOVE the way they turned out. One thing to consider (which i didnt before i purchased) was that these are not round knobs so lining them up parallel to all the other knobs was a challenge. LoL. I love them and i would recommend these knobs and i would buy again! It was super nice that this set came with two different lengths of screws. Each knob was individually wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: CHASE

customer_reviews.title: No extra screws in this size pack
customer_reviews.text: The handles are great, but out of the packages I ordered, this set of 5 did not come with the 'extra' screws that make it easy to put the handles on cabinets of different widths. The 10 and 25 packs did come with these extra screws. Great handles to upgrade old cabinets into modern era. Fits in the existing 3" holes. Solid, not hollow. Nice sheen but not glaringly shiny.
customer_reviews.author: ihrtamzn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, solid hardware!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 50 of these handles for my kitchen and bathroom on a home we just built. These are solid and very well made—not cheap feeling at all. NONE of the pulls I ordered had any issues with not being square or being uneven. They were all spot on perfect! And they came with two different lengths of screws which was awesome since my drawers used the longer screws and the doors used the shorter ones. I have shaker cabinets and used the Kreg cabinet template (amazing!!!) to mark where to drill. I was able to do everything in half a day. Super pleased with them and how they make my new kitchen look!
customer_reviews.author: MotherofDragons

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised by the quality of these pulls, especially with the low cost. I had been searching for copper colored pulls and found nothing remotely close to this quality for the cost. Time will tell if they hold up well, but they appear quite heavy duty and resistant to scratching and fingerprints. I also appreciated the long screws in the package were actually long enough for drawers with rather thick facing. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan J Dockendorf

customer_reviews.title: Solid heavy pulls and knobs!
customer_reviews.text: Received these banded pulls and knobs and they look great, they are heavy and sturdy! Had ordered a different brand and that I had to return because they had no weight to them. Looked these up on the alpine website and they are going for $7 each so the amazon price is a steal!! Haven't installed yet will update review once I get that done.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product. Still a five star product but wish it had screw length options due to the design of the thread insert. So just a heads up to customers if you plan to use these handles if your existing handles use 1” screws; word of advice is to purchase #8-32 x 1-1/4” screws. Packaging will have 1 and 2 inch screws...one being too short the other being too long in my case. Love them overall kitchen looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: AndBri

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, priced right and very study!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it make my cabinets look way more modern as you see in the pictures. In one of the above pictures I show both the old rounded hardware and the new T-bar handle. I love the new look!!! They were easy to attached and I used the screws from the old hardware! I make a good choice, and the price was right! Love them!!❤️
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a package of 25. I needed 20 but after reading some of these reviews, I thought I may need a few extra. The entire bag was great with no problems at all. I really appreciated having two sizes of screws, because I needed a little of both for my cabinets. These handles are heavy and my mom liked mine so well, she's buying a package of 50. You can't beat this price!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Staske

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but a terrible design, Garbage screws
customer_reviews.text: Horrible design. Even the small screws are too long and the pegs screw off of the handle so you have to fight them u stewing as you’re fighting the cheap screws from stripping. Had to hand twist them off every drawer to get it right. I finally used the screws from the handles I was replacing and they went on fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: frustrating, missing handles
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the product for my kitchen cabinets. It states there was 25 in the box. How frustrating to install a hardware and 1 is missing. I emailed the company last week and no response. I am NOT taking a 24 handles off my cabinet doors just to return it. I guess i have to find one locally...ugh extremely irritating!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ball

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and solid
customer_reviews.text: No quality control issues at all. Ordered 25 5" brushed nickel, and each one was perfect. Ordering 10 more to finish a kitchen remodel project and will use again in our future kitchen. Such an amazing deal. Solid and heavy and expensive looking/feeling. Absolutely gorgeous. If you're on the fence or still researching pulls, these are the ones to buy. 100%
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wade

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described & a great value; however, there were only 47 handles/pulls in this 50 pack. Contacted Amazon about the issue, but the rep wanted me to go through the process of returning the 47 and re-ordering another 50 pulls that would come two/three days from now. Normally I would have done this but, my contractors needed the handles/pulls today. Also ordered a set of 30 that was complete.
customer_reviews.author: thnx4shopping2day

customer_reviews.title: Overall quality is good overall, but expect to see some with scratches
customer_reviews.text: Pros: sent both long and short screws, love the copper accents on the edges, good quality overall. Cons: out of the package of 25, 5 have scratches or marks on them. Poor quality control. Screws can strip easily, be precise and firm when screwing in. Pricing is consistent with home improvement stores, which generally carry the brushed nickel version. I will be contacting the seller regarding the 25% of the product which are damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey C

customer_reviews.title: You Need to hand start Every Screw otherwise you will have Issuse
customer_reviews.text: These handles are a great value and are solid. WARNING!!! Do not use a power drill to install these. We thought we were going to have to send them all back as the first 3 all bound up and could not be installed. After hand starting each crew, we were able to install all 50 handles.. If you read the other reviews, this is a common issue with these handles.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and surprisingly heavy
customer_reviews.text: These are so heavy not cheap material or cheap looking. I brought two 30 count boxes to switch out the hardware in my kitchen and bathrooms. It’s a great modern look.
customer_reviews.author: noteasy2pls

customer_reviews.title: SOLID handles, good buy
customer_reviews.text: We accidentally bought a similar handle from an Amazon seller first...those were hollow and cheap. For a few dollars more we got these instead, they are solid and are almost 5x the less for a near match at the local big box home improvement store. Could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.  Exactly the same as big box
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about these pulls. I mean how could they charge nearly $7 at the big box, and around $1.30 here? But I figured I would try (amazon is very good on returns). The picture is a side-by-side comparison of one pull from the big box and one from amazon. Not being convinced by sight alone, I weighed them and they were almost identical. So you tell me which is which. Anyway, I bought 50 of them for my new kitchen, and saved a TON of money. No duds.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these knobs look! They really updated my kitchen and bathroom cabinets in a quick and easy way. My main concern is that these knobs are made of 2 separate pieces and about 1/4 would not stay together. I should have tried to reach out to them and get some replaced but never did. I would not reccommend
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rachel Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! With an update
customer_reviews.text: These are very heavy, high quality, modern handles. So glad I chose them! Update: I should have reviewed them after installing. They are designed with two steel bars and one goes into the other. Where they meet are not glued and I have one that broke and won't go back together. Also the threading inside does not match the two screws they give. That makes it difficult to screw in. I managed to make it mostly work out and it looks great but I question the longevity of these.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Good handle.  Great look.  May need to swap out some screws.
customer_reviews.text: First time they sent some 4” when I ordered all 3”. They resent right ones quickly. Then several had threads that were bigger than the screws included. I just need to get the right size screw to fit. The handle itself is sturdy and great quality. I do like the look. I guess this is how it goes on Amazon these days. Manufacturer said they didn’t even make a 4”!!??!! Amazon is perhaps just getting too big!
customer_reviews.author: Helen G. O'Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Happy With These Handles
customer_reviews.text: These handles are TERRIFIC! They arrived on time and are nice and solid. My husband also bought a template to install the handles which made it a lot faster. We bought two different sizes and used them in our kitchen, bathrooms & on the bases for the new built-ins were working on. I would definitely recommend these to anyone! We’re SO happy we picked these handles!
customer_reviews.author: RMB

customer_reviews.title: Heavyweight solid construction feels luxurious
customer_reviews.text: Wow. These are amazing. The look, the feel, the solid construction and associated weight gave our kitchen and bathrooms a classy feel. I installed more than two dozen of these and I never had a problem with any handle (misaligned holes, bad finish, warped, etc.). We’re so glad we purchased these. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice handle, reasonably priced... but beware.
customer_reviews.text: The handle is nice for the price, heavy and with a nice brushed finish. i needed more than 32 handles so I bought a 40 pack which was a good option as i can use a couple of the left overs on projects. Of the 32 handles I installed I did have one that had mounting posts that were not parallel and could not be lined up with the holes drilled. I used a knob and handle drill fixture to make sure the handles lined up. They look quite nice in place of the "el-cheapo" builder quality handles that were installed on my solid maple cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: EngineGuy57

customer_reviews.title: High quality hardware
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Thes were so easy for my husband to install. High quality product! I have wiped them down with every kind of cleaning product and they hold up with no fading or spots. Clean and traditional look. Lowes and Home Depot sells something similar for about 2 times as much. Once again you cannot beat Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Can't Beat Price
customer_reviews.text: Price is way cheaper than in store and the pulls seem to be handling well. I remodeled my kitchen 2 months ago and used these guys; saved me over $200 and I can't tell the difference between big box store brand and these.
customer_reviews.author: David Krawcheck

customer_reviews.title: Lots of  score or mark on the surface
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 - 25 packs for my client and I would say every single one of them has some score or mark on the surface. I was getting ready to install it and I went thru almost half of the bag on both packages and could not find one that I can be able to use it without any mark. Even the plastic packages has tear, rips and holes on all of them.. So I am returning both of them. Waste of my time and unhappy client
customer_reviews.author: Oya Wollman

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 25-packs of Alpine 3" pulls at $31.98 per pack. Not one was defective, so I don't know what other reviewers are talking about. Check out the photo. On the left is this Alpine product at $1.37 per unit including 7% sales tax. On the right is the identical product by Liberty at a big box store for $5.34 per unit including 7% sales tax. Same solid stainless steel with a brushed satin nickel finish, not that cheap hollow crap. Weigh exactly the same, look exactly the same. Came with extra screws in two sizes. This is a smart buy!
customer_reviews.author: H.R.

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight and love how they're individually wrapped. Based on reviews I warned my contractor about the possibility of the handles being off centered or uneven... He had no issues and they look great!! Hoping they won't lose they're glam. Based on what I've experienced, I can highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Lovin' Life

customer_reviews.title: Good look, happy with the result.
customer_reviews.text: Love these handles. Installation was ridiculous. The two small rods come unscrewed when attaching the handles to the cabinet doors. Two handles had to be thrown away during the process. Some are crooked for some reason, but it’s not super noticeable. I’m happy with the look of the end product.
customer_reviews.author: BEegirl

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control is Lacking
customer_reviews.text: Approximately 10% of stainless steel handles were misaligned. I required all 50 handles to complete the project so I had to use all pieces which made the project look unprofessional. The undamaged handles look nice but because of the poor quality control overall, I cannot give Alpine Hardware a good rating.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: solid piece - used them all - had to buy longer screws for my cabinets
customer_reviews.text: Minimalist design. Very simple T. I needed to order longer screws for my drawers fronts. Easy to install! I don't know how they will last on the paint but they seem solidly made. 1 star drop was due to having to go to hardware store to purchase 15 longer screws to fit my cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: J. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I’ve orders similar handles the past and they came with some sort of hole template to ensure you could mark the wholes needed to be made. These did not. Second I had various handles come unscrewed from the legs while installing them to the screws. It didn’t take much for that to happen and it was difficult to get the screw off to put it back together. The weight of the handles is very nice and they feel like great quality. They look extremely nice once installed.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: they are very nice
customer_reviews.text: only thing I am concerned with is I just started to put them on and on 2 of them the screw broke inside the handle. I wasn't forcing them or anything, the screw just broke. hope no more break. was so angry I quit putting them on. be very careful putting the screws in. Other than this problem they are really nice handle and will be a great addition to our kitchen. now to find just 2 handles to replace the ones I can't get the broken screw out of.
customer_reviews.author: marv coak

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal Around!!!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped the internet for hours to find the best deal for hardware for my new build kitchen cabinets. Arrived quickly. They are very heavy and sturdy. I believe I read in the comments before ordering that people were having problems with installation. I did not install, my builder did, but there were only 1, maybe 2 pieces not accounted for. Worth WAY more than what I paid. The price was almost unbelievable. I love, love, love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with product itself, quality, etc. but I purchased a 25 pack of stainless steel handles and there was (1) out of the 25 that was a copper color and that was upsetting as I needed all 25 will contact company to see what my options are and will update review.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Heavy, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I purchased, I saw that they had some bad reviews saying that it’s uneven/Need to do quality control. Well I just bought it last week. I can confirm that they fixed it and the quality is GREAT! Feel very heavy like the $6 each at other stores. I’m so happy I was able to save a lot of money! If I purchased at other store would be like $450, here I spend under $100 for 75 handle pulls. I had a little small issue, I will contact the seller, let see what they say.
customer_reviews.author: Wei Ping

customer_reviews.title: Great product for an awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, look great on my kitchen cabinets. Very happy that I purchased them through Amazon, they are double the price at Home Depot or Lowes. I first ordered the copper and it was not the correct color for me, so I switched it to gold. The gold was perfect and the return and refund was seamless and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Leonel Torres

customer_reviews.title: A Great quality product & Solid Stainless Steel Brush Nickel Finish
customer_reviews.text: We just installed these handles in our New Renovated kitchen - Well “Worth” the money and they look very nice. These handles are “solid” - with two sets of screws for the depth of thickness. Trust me this is the way to go. I am very pleased with Alpine products. Would buy again and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: JAM9

customer_reviews.title: Slow and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I found the install on these needed to be done by hand, no power tools. The threading was a bit... unrefined. Twisting by fingers and finishing off with screw driver made the best install situation. To fast and the screws provided would bind, how bad? To the point of having to use vice grips to remove bound screws and that instance the threaded post came undone from the main handle. three stars as price is acceptable for additional time required for installs. If you have a lot to do, try tackling the project in small number of installs at a time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hill

customer_reviews.title: These are nice and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and beautiful, few are not sized correctly/stripped so to cause less agrevation check first before installing. I bought 5 boxes for entire house (medium size and large size) a few from each box... but they feel and look exactly like the $6-8 ones...
customer_reviews.author: Hohan

customer_reviews.title: These are Beautiful Cabinet and Drawer Pulls, Love Tfhem
customer_reviews.text: These Stainless Steel Cabinet Pulls are Beautiful! What a surprise, I assumed for the Price that they would be light weight, these make my whole kitchen beautiful. I just ordered more for my Kitchen Drawers. I thought that they might be too big for my drawers but they are prefect. I just painted my whole kitchen cabinets and drawers white, and love these..
customer_reviews.author: Judy L. Sturdivant

customer_reviews.title: Short shipped, no screws, wrong size, but otherwise good pulls
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 times before giving up, piecing together what I can to finish this job, and spending more money to buy extra screws. 1st order, they only sent me a 10 pack. 2nd order lost somewhere in pulling stage. 3rd order they sent me a 25 pack, but they are 3 inch hole spreads and there are no screws in the bags. I gave 2 stars because I like the pulls/good value/pretty good quality. Operations and Suppy Chain for this company need to get their acts together and properly ship what they are representing on Amazon. If you have plenty of time to ship back wrong items, by all means consider these. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: bilu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: —Not quite finished with the project but you see the handles, nonetheless— The seller was fast, honest and personal. Would definitely purchase again. The cabinet handles are astonishing in their value and beauty. Screws and holes all lined up, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: sgs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: All in all not bad. Very heavy, which I like, but the mounting part is threaded a like weak and I had to crank a couple down which scratched them up. In hindsight I should've put a barrier between the handle and the wrench. Definitely a good value, especially compared to buying at a big box retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Sloth

customer_reviews.title: Easy and impressive decor refresh
customer_reviews.text: Paint plus these handles gave total bathroom makeover. No issues with quality. Be aware that thread tolerance is very close so screws have to be exactly straight or they bind. So pleased I bought 50 black ones to do the kitchen cabinets. Great value and have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a bunch of these (50) to install on our kitchen cabinets and mud room cabinets. They're heavy, feel great and look great. Some of the threadings inside of the handles didn't work with the screws (I promise you that I wasn't inadvertently cross-threading them). I could've put an impact on it and made it work but that's not the right thing to go. Given the price and quantity, having 1 or 2 out of 50 fail wasn't a big deal for us. I'd definitely buy again. 100%
customer_reviews.author: Dan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Looked to update kitchen cabinet and drawer hardware. Needed 48 so I bought (2) 25 unit packs. Did not have any rejects - that said, if one didn't "fit" due to differences in both cabinets and/or pull, I would turn it over or put it in a different spot where it did fit. Also, if I couldn't put the screw in up to 50% with my fingers, I would do the same (turn end for end or move to a different location) this avoided cross threading screws. VERY satisfied with this product, look very nice and fit the hand well.
customer_reviews.author: EeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Only about half can be installed
customer_reviews.text: About 50 percent of these can be installed normally, that of course means the other 50 percent the screw couldn't be screwed in all the way - misthreading, obstruction, soft head that wears out - a bunch of problems and really low quality. If you can find these elsewhere for twice as much, get those because you'll end up with the same number of working pulls and a lot less frustration.
customer_reviews.author: mauldin

customer_reviews.title: Really nice handles
customer_reviews.text: Love these handles for my new kitchen. They are streamlined looking and solid not a cheap hollow product. The set came with two different length screws to allow them to be used in whichever thickness of doors is needed. The price at a local big box store would have been way more than what I spent on these. They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kraftylady

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: We saved SO much money getting these on Amazon!!! We bought 75 of them; they came in handy in the kitchen and kids bathroom. They are sturdy and look so nice. Nice enough to fool everyone into thinking we bought these at fancy bathroom store prices. Hallelujah thank the lord we didn’t! Thank YOU!
customer_reviews.author: thecharliemike

customer_reviews.title: Budget Friendly Modern Pull
customer_reviews.text: Upon the suggestions of other reviewers I used a 8-32 tap to thread all the handles before install and then used 8-32 screws in multiple lengths. The extra effort paid off as install was a breeze and the finished product is a very premium look at an insanely low price. Would recommend to anyone wanting a budget friendly cabinet pull that provides a modern look.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Hammac

product_meta.title: Alpine Hardware | 25Pack ~ 3" (76mm) Hole Center | Solid Stainless Steel, Bar Handle Pull with A Fine-Brushed Satin Nickel Finish | Kitchen Cabinet Hardware/Dresser Drawer Handles
feature_bullets: Strong & Durable Drawer Handles, these pulls can prove functional & elegant throughout the years. These are not hollow like other competitors.
The European styling of the bar pull adds a strong contemporary flavor to any cabinet door style. They are made of SOLID stainless steel with a fine brushed Satin Nickel finish.

Alpine Hardware makes installation easy by using our new drilling template. It can be purchased here: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07RZNR2ZK?ref=myi_title_dp. Hand screw the pulls when installing for best results.
The Satin Nickel Cabinet Pulls are 3 Inches Center to Center (mounting holes) 5.38" Overall length.
One Year Warranty - If there's a product quality issue we will refund / replace your order.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,886 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
